context_bundle.summary: Advanced HTTP/REST patterns: OAuth 2.0 flow (auth code -> token -> refresh), API key auth (header/query/bearer), Basic auth (Base64), pagination (offset/cursor/page), rate limiting (429 handling, exponential backoff), file upload via PowerShell multipart

onboarding.quick_start: Auth header: {"Authorization": "Bearer token"} or {"X-API-Key": "key"}. Handle 429 with exponential backoff. Parse JSON response -> access %JsonObj.property%
common_patterns: Pagination loop: offset += limit until response.count < limit
known_errors: Content-Type must match body (application/json for JSON)
File upload needs PowerShell - PAD lacks multipart/form-data
Rate limits in headers: X-RateLimit-Remaining, Retry-After
